template.name: @Get

template.name: @Post
template.value: /** * @OA\Post( * tags={"name"}, * path="/api/path/{id}", * summary="name store", * @OA\RequestBody( * required=true, * @OA\JsonContent( * type="object", * required={"xxx"}, * @OA\Property(property="xxx", type="string") * ) * ), * @OA\Response( * response=201, * description="OK", * @OA\JsonContent(ref="#/components/schemas/nameResource") * ), * @OA\Response(response=401, description="Unauthorized"), * @OA\Response(response=404, description="Not Found") * ) */

template.name: @Delete
template.value: /** * @OA\Delete( * tags={"name"}, * path="/api/path/{id}", * summary="name destroy", * @OA\Parameter(ref="#/components/parameters/id"), * @OA\Response( * response=200, * description="OK", * @OA\JsonContent(ref="#/components/schemas/name") * ), * @OA\Response(response=404, description="Not Found") * ) */

template.name: @Put
template.value: /** * @OA\Put( * tags={"name"}, * path="/api/path/{id}", * summary="name update", * @OA\Parameter(ref="#/components/parameters/id"), * @OA\RequestBody( * required=true, * @OA\JsonContent( * type="object", * required={"xxxx"}, * @OA\Property(property="xxxx", type="string") * ) * ), * @OA\Response( * response=200, * description="OK", * @OA\JsonContent(ref="#/components/schemas/nameResource") * ), * @OA\Response(response=404, description="Not Found"), * @OA\Response(response=422, description="Unprocessable Entity") * ) */
